info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 31 at 6:03PM EST until December 31 at 6:30PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EST FOR WEST CENTRAL MORGAN...SOUTH CENTRAL WALTON AND NORTHEASTERN NEWTON COUNTIES... At 602 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Brick Store, or near Covington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Social Circle, Rutledge and Herndonville. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
